thread.title: Governor consults top officials on Memon's plea
thread.title_full: Governor consults top officials on Memon's plea - Qatar Tribune - First with the news and whats behind it

author: Mumbai Maharashtra
title: Governor consults top officials on Memon's plea
text:
Mumbai Maharashtra Governor Ch Vidyasagar Rao on Saturday held consultations with Home and Law Department officials on the mercy petition submitted by 1993 Mumbai blasts convict Yakub Memon.
The BJP-led government headed by Devendra Fadnavis had sent its opinion to the Governor late on Friday on the plea submitted by Memon following the Supreme Court's rejection of his curative petition which sought a stay on execution of his death sentence slated for July 30.
The Governor on Saturday called Additional Chief Secretary (Home) K P Bakshi, Law and Judiciary officials and Advocate General Anil Singh for consultations.
When asked about the outcome of the meeting, official sources said,"There has been no decision. The matter is under consideration of the Governor." (PTI)
